response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth of $1,000,000 to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure that you can acquire this exceptional product without compromising on your budget. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, contributing to your long-term success and growth. Please let me know if you require any further information or if there's anything else we can assist you with. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 950000}
